Content.Title: New Online Degree Students
Content.Abstract: Welcome Brigham Young University-Idaho Online Students!
Content.BodyCopy:
Welcome Brigham Young University-Idaho Online Students!

All of us at BYU-Idaho are very excited for you to begin this next chapter in your life. Furthering your education is one of the most important things you can do for yourself, your future and your family. Using the BYU-Idaho Learning Model you will not only prepare technically and professionally for your career, you will grow, develop and strengthen your testimony of the Lord Jesus Christ and his gospel here on the earth. You will become leaders in your field of choice and will become, and be known for your ability as a disciple leader.

The first official course you will take as a BYU-Idaho online student is GS 111- Realize Vision. This course will help establish a foundation for success throughout your entire program. This is a one credit course that will prepare you academically, introduce you to the "Spirit of Ricks", and the uniquely inspired BYU-Idaho Learning Model, while helping you to see the great mission of BYU-Idaho. As part of this course you will work closely with an Academic Advisor that will assist you in preparing a graduation plan. This is where you will account for any college course work previously obtained and decide what courses you will need to complete to acquire a BYU-Idaho degree online.

Please click here to register for the GS 111 course.

Please note: If you were a participant of the Pathway Program and completed 'GS 120 Pathway Life Skills', or if you are entering BYU-Idaho's Nursing program, you do not need to register for the orientation course.

Congratulations for making the decision to further your education and for investing in your future. You have made an excellent choice in BYU-Idaho. We are thrilled to have you as part of our student body and cannot wait to see you develop in knowledge and faith.

Sincerely,

Brandie Miguel

Online Programs Coordinator
